lead_paragraph: FALK--Dr. Charles. February 11, 2016, 92, was Associate Director, Brookhaven National Lab 1962-66; At the National Science Foundation as Planning Director 1966-70, and Director of the Division of National Science Resources Studies 1970-85. 1/3
